meta_description: The Maritime & Seafood Industry Museum was established in 1986 to preserve and interpret the maritime history and heritage of Biloxi and the Mississippi Gulf Coast.
collections_text:
# Explore over 300 years of history, heritage and culture.

# EXPERIENCE THE MS GULF COAST'S MARITIME & SEAFOOD INDUSTRY MUSEUM.

## FEATURE EXHIBIT

### Copper Meets Coast in this beautiful exhibit of handcrafted copper and cypress works of art!  
Master coppersmith, Scott Bollich, is the owner of "The Copper Tiger" located in Baton Rouge, Louisiana. Inspired by his time in the swamps, bayous, woods, marshes, and visits to the Gulf Coast, his collection reflects the beauty found in his travels and everyday life. Each piece is unique and available for purchase.   

### Scott Bollich
